miic.core.miic_utils.comb_with_missed_stations¶

comb_with_missed_stations(n_stations, std_comb, missed_stations)[source]¶

Create the list of combinations.

Create the list of possible combinations between a specified number of stations. Two different possibility are available: Auto-corr and Full-corr. The former generates a list of tuples of this form (n,n) while the latter generates all the possible tuples of this form (n,m) where n!=m and 0 <= n < n_trace and 0 <= m < n_trace. It handles missed stations so that every station listed in the missed_stations parameter will not be included in the final list of combinations.

Parameters:
  • n_trace (int) – Number of traces
  • std_comb (enum) – Type of combination to generate. It can be one of: [‘Auto-corr’,’Full-corr’]
  • missed_stations (list) – Missed stations list (e.g. [2,5,6])
Return type:

list of tuples
Returns:

comb: List of possible combinations. For example, if n_trace==3 and std_comb=='Auto-corr' -> comb = [(0,0),(1,1),(2,2)]
